§ remote‐graphic‐instruction‐set (ReGIS)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The ReGIS graphics data‐format is a data‐format used by a number computer‐terminals for vector‐graphics.

ReGIS is an abbreviation for remote‐graphic‐instruction‐set.
